== Description ==
Clears the cache held by [[Function_Reference/get theme roots|get_theme_roots()]] and [[Class_Reference/WP_Theme|WP_Theme]].

== Usage ==
%%% <?php wp_clean_themes_cache() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
This function does not accept parameters

== Return Values ==
No value is returned
